results.definition: toiletry consisting of any of various substances in the form of a thick liquid that have a soothing and moisturizing effect when applied to the skin
the best people or things in a group
examples: the cream of England's young men were killed in the Great War

results.definition: beat thoroughly and conclusively in a competition or fight

examples: skim cream from the surface of milk

results.definition: add cream to one's coffee, for example
put on cream, as on one's face or body
examples: She creams her face every night

results.definition: the part of milk containing the butterfat
